eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.persistence.repository

Interface NodeRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseVertexRepository<eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node>

    public interface NodeRepository
extends BaseVertexRepository<eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node>
    Repository for operations with Node domain objects.

      • create

        eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node create(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node node,
                                                             eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node parentNode,
                                                             eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Resource resource,
                                                             eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.dto.RevisionInterval revisionInterval)
        Creates new node, with specified parent node (X) and resource node (Y), where Y is not a resource of X. Warning: input where Y is resource of X brings inconsistency to database model. This is not checked automatically. Positive example: 
        
        (Resouce: ORA)  (Resouce: ORA DDL )
               |                        |
        (Node: Package)                 |
               |________________________|
               |
      (Node: Package body)
        Parameters:
        node - new node, not null
        parentNode - existing node, not null
        resource - existing resource, not null
        revisionInterval - revision interval, not null
        Returns:
        new node with generated id

      • remove

        void remove(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node node,
          java.lang.Boolean recursive)
        Removes node. Operation can be recursive - the behaviour is analogical with updateRevisionEnd(Node, Double, Boolean).
        Parameters:
        node - node to be deleted
        recursive - flag, whether the operation is recursive

      • updateRevisionEnd

        void updateRevisionEnd(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node node,
                     java.lang.Double revisionEnd,
                     java.lang.Boolean recursive)
        Set transaction end of a node or, if recursive of the whole subtree. Operation can be recursive, only if the revision interval is shortened. If the revision interval is prolonged, the flag is not taken into consideration. If operation is recursive, all vertices in the subtree (and their edges) valid in will have their endRevision cut to this value. Subtree is specified by its root vertex. Vertices and edges absent in are ignored. WARNIGN: If vertex' or edge's new end revision is less than its revision interval start, the vertex or the edge is REMOVED from the repository (together with its whole subtree). In case of hasAttribute edge, not only the edge but also the nodeAttribute is removed. Example: 
         _________________________________________________________________________________________________________
 <1.000000, 1.999999>                 <1.000000, 1.999999>
        nodeA-----------hasAttribute-------->attrA
          |
          +-------------------------------+
          |                               |
 <1.000000, 1.111111>            <1.000000, 1.999999>    <1.000000, 1.999999>      <1.000000, 1.999999>
        nodeB                           nodeC----------------directFlow------------------>nodeD

 _________________________________________________________________________________________________________
                                                  Before

 -----------------------------------------------------
  updateRevisionEnd(nodeA, 1.555555)
 -----------------------------------------------------
 _________________________________________________________________________________________________________
 <1.000000, 1.555555>                 <1.000000, 1.555555>
        nodeA-----------hasAttribute-------->attrA
          |
          +-------------------------------+
          |                               |
 <1.000000, 1.111111>            <1.000000, 1.555555>    <1.000000, 1.555555>      <1.000000, 1.999999>
        nodeB                           nodeC----------------directFlow------------------>nodeD
 _________________________________________________________________________________________________________
                                                  After
        Notice from the example above: 1) nodeB absent in the revision 1.555555 is ignored (its tranEnd remains unchanged) 2) directFlow between nodeC and nodeD has its revision interval end changed (since it is connected to the affected nodeC) 3) nodeD is ignored, since it is NOT in the subtree with the root nodeA
        Parameters:
        node - start node
        revisionEnd - new end of revision interval
        recursive - flag, whether the operation is recursive (and applies on the whole subtree)

      • getRevisionInterval

        eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.dto.RevisionInterval getRevisionInterval(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node node)

      • getResource

        eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Resource getResource(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node node,
                                                                      java.lang.Boolean recursive)
        Returns resource of node. Operation can be recursive (if node itself has no resource, its parent tried). Can return null in case of non-recursive query. Never returns null in case of recursive query.
        Parameters:
        node - start node, not null
        recursive - flag, whether the query should be recursive; not null
        Returns:
        resource of start node, nullable

      • getParent

        eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node getParent(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node node)
        Returns parent of given node. Parent can be null in case the node is in the first level under resource.
        Parameters:
        node - start node, not null
        Returns:
        parent of start node, nullable

      • getDirectOutputFlow

        java.util.List<eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node> getDirectOutputFlow(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node node,
                                                                                          eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.dto.RevisionInterval revisionInterval)
        Returns nodes which are the target of nodes output direct flow. Only nodes connected with edges valid on the whole given revision interval are returned.
        Parameters:
        node - start node, not null
        revisionInterval - revision interval of valid flow edges, nullable
        Returns:
        flow-connected nodes
        See Also:
        for other flow operations

      • getChild

        eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node getChild(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node node,
                                                               java.lang.String name)
        Returns child node of node with given name. Only last committed revision is searched.
        Parameters:
        node - start node, not null
        name - node name restriction, not null
        Returns:
        node or null

      • getChild

        eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node getChild(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.Node node,
                                                               java.lang.String name,
                                                               java.lang.Boolean includeUncommitted)
        Returns child node of node with given name. Searched revisions are:
        • the last committed one - always
        • the uncommitted one - if is true
        Parameters:
        node - start node, not null
        name - node name restriction, not null
        includeUncommitted - flag, whether to search in uncommitted revision, not null
        Returns:
        node or null

      • getChildren

                                                                                  java.lang.String name,
                                                                                  eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.dto.RevisionInterval revisionInterval)
        Returns direct successors (children) of the node. Nodes need to be valid on the whole to be returned.
        Parameters:
        node - start node, not null
        name - node name restriction, nullable
        revisionInterval - revision interval restriction, nullable
        Returns:
        child nodes of node
